column4: OMG when i click system>about ubuntu it says cannot launch entry ! i'm trying to think ubuntu and linux are bad after all
when i click system>about ubuntu it says cannot launch entry
what version of ubuntu are you running (please don't repeat yourself)
it is hard for us to guess what is wrong with your system; what have you changed since it last worked?
normal system updates (synaptic or apt-get etc); to compile your own kernel, see the kernelhowto on the wiki (wiki.ubuntu.com/KernelHowto)
use synaptic (much easier) or 'sudo apt-get install linux-686'
I wouldn't upgrade my kernel unless I had a good reason too
i doubt upgrading the kernel will help; the same sound drivers will be used in both
what you are doing will install a -686 version of the 2.6.10 kernel
breezy will be out this Friday
you can get a preview release now, but i'd recommend waiting
you can use synaptic to update
